response.overview: Yang Huixin, a Christian, has loved being a good person since she was little. She doesn't like to offend others. She believes herself to be a good person because she is kind and agreeable with others. But only after she accepts God's gospel of the last days and undergoes the judgment and chastisement of God's words does she have an awakening, and realize that she's not a true good person. Rather, she lives based on satanic philosophies, and is a very selfish, cunning "nice guy." She resolves in her heart to seek the truth and become a good person who is honest and uprightâ€¦. What experiences did Yang Huixin go through that allowed her to undergo such a transformation?

production_companies.name: Judgment Seat of Christ Film Studio

response.tagline: What Is a Truly Good Person?
response.title: I Am a Good Person!
